music21.audioSearch.omrfollow¶

Functions¶

music21.audioSearch.omrfollow.recognizeKuhlau()¶

A more difficult task: a difficult to read 19th c. non-retypeset score: Kuhlau’s op81 second flute part. N.B. – missing page 18 (=p2) and 24.

Only does the first couple of pages

music21.audioSearch.omrfollow.recognizeLuca()¶

can music21 using audio search recognize which page I play if I play a passage from dLuca’s gloria OMRd?

Works great!

OMR was done with SharpEye Light on Finale.

music21.audioSearch.omrfollow.recognizeScore(scorePart, pageMeasureNumbers, iterations=1)¶
